column4: hmm ... why do I get asked for my password at "localhost" when I try to install a new printer? and no, it's not a password I seem to know
anybody knows why I get asked for a password for localhost when installing a local printer? (epson DX 4400)
any1 tell me how to close X server plss
either ctrl+alt+backspace to restart it, or ctrl+alt+F1, then log in, then sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop
